jcr:content.jcr:description: The All-New Mont Blanc BOA® trail running shoes feature a precision fit with quick adjustability and max cushion for fast long-distance trail miles.
jcr:content.jcr:title: Mont Blanc BOA
jcr:content.pageTitle: All-New Mont Blanc BOA® Trail Running Shoes | Altra Running

customhtml2_90919454.customHTML:
Mont Blanc BOA®

Mont Blanc

Mont Blanc BOA®

customhtml2_11446045.customHTML:
THE ALL-NEW MONT BLANC BOA®

Comfort, meet speed.

Tackle the toughest trails for miles with a precise fit in the all-new Mont Blanc BOA® ultimate long-distance trail shoe.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
DIAL IN YOUR BEST FIT.

The all-new Mont Blanc BOA® is equipped with the BOA® Fit System, which allows for a micro-adjustable, precision fit. Gain a closer connection to the trail and superior stability on dynamic terrain. Adjust in a matter of seconds to achieve your personalized fit throughout the day as conditions change.

customhtml2_copy_cop_1057409756.customHTML:
Ultra cushion for
ultra excursions

Just like the Mont Blanc, the Mont Blanc BOA® is equipped with our Altra EGO™ MAX midsole foam to bring ultimate comfort to the trail. This max cushion is designed for the longest, hardest trail runs.

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Ultimate grip

According to Vibram®, Vibram® Litebase midsole reduces weight while maintaining Vibram® quality in grip, traction, and durability.

Natural performance
on the trails

The Mont Blanc BOA® features our Standard FootShape™ Fit, our most common fit found in Altra Running® shoes. This feature allows your toes to relax and sit naturally for miles on rugged terrain, encouraging the best performance for your long-distance run.

customhtml2_copy_cop_1928087565.customHTML:
PEEK INSIDE THE
BOA® FIT LAB

See how BOA®, Altra, and Elite Athletes collaborated to develop the ultimate long-distance trail shoe.
